wikipedia_page.main: Thomas McMillan Campbell (born 20 February 1935 in Glasgow; died 2018) was a Scottish footballer, who played as striker for Kilmarnock, Albion Rovers (two spells), Dundee United, Tranmere Rovers, Dumbarton and Stenhousemuir.

response: * Tommy Campbell (actor) (born 1978), stand-up comedian, actor and writer
* Tommy Campbell (American football) (born 1947), former American football player
